--- On Mon, 9/7/09, Mio Yamada <purplealienmio@...> wrote:

This one and the next chapter features quite a bit of Itou in it. I'm sorry if people don't like my portrayal of his character. >>

I think you did a fine job of portraying Itou and how he was seen u others.

~ Barbara Sheridan

Taking romance further
BarbaraSheridan.com

messages.subject: Fanfic Update
messages.msgSnippet: Hello hello, I don t know how much interest there might be but I have finally, finally updated my fic The Courtship of Lady Tokio . Shameless plug:
messages.messageBody:
Hello hello,

I don't know how much interest there might be but
I have finally, finally updated my fic "The Courtship of Lady Tokio".
Shameless plug:

http://www.fanfiction.net/s/2049030/28/The_Courtship_of_Lady_Tokio

This one and the next chapter features quite a bit of Itou in it. I'm sorry if people don't like my portrayal of his character.
Also, since I dedicated this story to Hakubaikou, I will be finishing it, hopefully by the end of the year.

Best wishes,
Mio




[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [SHQ] Thrilled to announce...
messages.msgSnippet: oooooooooooooooooo! very exciting !!!! I will probably get the e version to be supportive. *is still excited* ... From: secretarytocapt3
messages.messageBody:
oooooooooooooooooo!
very exciting !!!!
I will probably get the e version to be supportive.
*is still excited*

--- On Tue, 9/1/09, secretarytocapt3 <secretarytocapt3@...> wrote:

From: secretarytocapt3 <secretarytocapt3@...>
Subject: [SHQ] Thrilled to announce...
To: SHQ@yahoogroups.com
Date: Tuesday, September 1, 2009, 10:53 AM






Â 





FALLING THROUGH GLASS

by Barbara Sheridan

a work of historical fiction published by Liquid Silver Books

which will first be released in e-book format on Sept 28th.



So keep an eye on this page: http://www.liquidsi lverbooks. com/



Book trailer:

http://www.youtube com/watch? v=Bd4WgfyKgFA

While the trailer doesn't show the Shinsengumi rest-assured the guys

are in the book.



I can't wait for this book to come out in paperback format but I admit the e-book format is sooo affordable. FALLING THROUGH GLASS is a classy mxf romance with the right balance of action and adventure. I enjoyed reading the early drafts, under the title of Mirror, Mirror, of this work but the FINAL FORM in which this work has taken is FABULOUS FOLKS!



:: SQUEEEEEEE ::



So one of our very own SHQ members will be the first non-Japanese

to publish a work of historical fiction featuring the Shinsengumi.



~~~~~~~~~~~~ ~~~~~~~~~ ~~~~~~~~~ ~~~~~~~~~ ~~~~



I apologize for neglecting SHQ but I'm sorting adjusting

to stuff in real-life including a new sleep schedule.

I look forward to fulfilling my goals with SHQ but at the same

time I'm sorting being pulled in different directions too.



Sorry for not restoring the site yet and being quiet all these months.































[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Thrilled to announce...
messages.msgSnippet: FALLING THROUGH GLASS by Barbara Sheridan a work of historical fiction published by Liquid Silver Books which will first be released in e-book format on Sept
messages.messageBody:
FALLING THROUGH GLASS
by Barbara Sheridan
a work of historical fiction published by Liquid Silver Books
which will first be released in e-book format on Sept 28th.

So keep an eye on this page: http://www.liquidsilverbooks.com/

Book trailer:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Bd4WgfyKgFA
While the trailer doesn't show the Shinsengumi rest-assured the guys
are in the book.

I can't wait for this book to come out in paperback format but I admit the e-book format is sooo affordable. FALLING THROUGH GLASS is a classy mxf romance with the right balance of action and adventure. I enjoyed reading the early drafts, under the title of Mirror, Mirror, of this work but the FINAL FORM in which this work has taken is FABULOUS FOLKS!

:: SQUEEEEEEE ::

So one of our very own SHQ members will be the first non-Japanese
to publish a work of historical fiction featuring the Shinsengumi.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

I apologize for neglecting SHQ but I'm sorting adjusting
to stuff in real-life including a new sleep schedule.
I look forward to fulfilling my goals with SHQ but at the same
time I'm sorting being pulled in different directions too.

Sorry for not restoring the site yet and being quiet all these months.
